comments.author: jvarga@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jvarga@mozilla.com
comments.text:
This is a followup from 617528.

There are already spec bugs filed to fix the problems in attribute "reflection".
We should make the attribute non-readonly once the spec is fixed.
comments.raw_text:
This is a followup from 617528.

There are already spec bugs filed to fix the problems in attribute "reflection".
We should make the attribute non-readonly once the spec is fixed.

http://www.w3.org/Bugs/Public/show_bug.cgi?id=12923 has been fixed

however, there's still bug http://www.w3.org/Bugs/Public/show_bug.cgi?id=12945
